```{r}
library(bnlearn)
```
nodes must be a vector of character strings
```{r}
bn = empty.graph(c("SP1", "LB1", "CP1", 
                      "VX1", "UR1", "SP2"))
arc.set <- matrix(c("SP1", "SP2", "LB1", "SP2", "CP1", 
                    "SP2", "SP1", "VX1", "UR1", "CP1", 
                    "VX1", "SP2", "UR1", "SP2"),
                  ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE,
                  dimnames = list(NULL, c('from', 'to')))
arc.set
```
```{r}
arcs(bn) <- arc.set
bn
```
